results.definition: a particular environment or surrounding influence
examples: there was an atmosphere of excitement

results.definition: a unit of pressure: the pressure that will support a column of mercury 760 mm high at sea level and 0 degrees centigrade
the mass of air surrounding the Earth
examples: there was great heat as the comet entered the atmosphere
it was exposed to the air

results.definition: the weather or climate at some place
examples: the atmosphere was thick with fog

results.definition: the envelope of gases surrounding any celestial body
a distinctive but intangible quality surrounding a person or thing
examples: the house had a neglected air
an atmosphere of defeat pervaded the candidate's headquarters
the place had an aura of romance
